vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to (1) convert the service contract with Sigma Surveillance, Inc. dba STS 360 from an indefinite delivery, indefinite quantity agreement to a fixed price, not to exceed contract of $16,327,955.38; and (2) reallocate funding within the contract from camera purchases to pay for services required for the expansion of the video surveillance camera system to be known as the Real-Time Crime Center - Financing:  No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to (1) convert the service contract with Sigma Surveillance, Inc. dba STS 360 from an indefinite delivery, indefinite quantity agreement to a fixed price, not to exceed contract of $16,327,955.38; and (2) reallocate funding within the contract from camera purchases to pay for services required for the expansion of the video surveillance camera system to be known as the Real-Time Crime Center - Financing:  No cost consideration to the City
